Reviews.Title: El Android Gama Media que debemos tener.
Reviews.Author: A. Alcala "The knower"
Reviews.Content: Para quien lo busque en Venezuela, este teléfono tiene dual SIM, sin embargo, solo una SIM trabaja con el 3G, levanta el 3g en 850 y 900 Mhz por lo que lo hace compatible con todas las operadoras de nuestro país.

Reviews.Title: ZTE V970M
Reviews.Author: juan "beto"
Reviews.Content: es un buen teléfono, ZTE es una buena marca cuando se trata de móviles,  acá en Venezuela un compañero lo tiene y le funciona bien,con sus dos lineas, yo oferte por uno estoy a la espera de que me lo envíen, no tiene nada que envidiarle a otros Smarphone.

Reviews.Title: Good but far from great...
Reviews.Author: D. Adams
Reviews.Content: I'm going to end up returning this phone...  Not so much because of problems, but for mislabeling some specs and it being weaker than I really wanted.  As a whole, this phone is actually quite nice.Build quality is actually quite good.  While it doesn't found quite as well made as some of the well-known brands, it still feels very sturdy.  Some people may not like the feel of the back cover, but I was fine with it.  The texture allowed for plenty of grip but it didn't gather too much lint or get hung in your pockets.The screen was much better than expected.  Colors looks very bright and vibrant with very even lighting.  It was certain just as good as my previous phone (Motorola Atrix).  The touch-screen was a different story though.  The middle was fine, but sensitivity dropped drastically around the edges.  Many times it would require multiple presses before registering the touch.  Very annoying at times...Call quality and audio surprised me.  I had no complaints from people I spoke with, and the ear piece was very loud and clear.  The speaker phone (or playing music/rings) sounded wonderful as well.  By far the best I've heard for a phone not being advertised as having some special "Beats Audio" or something like that!Software...well there is none.  This phone has Android 4.0 and that's it.  Unfortunate if you did want other utilities or like the bloatware/demos, but so you can load specifically what you want on the phone.Over-all performance was good.  I was a little disappointed in the scrolling speeds in Opera as compared to my Motorola.  Not terrible, but much more laggy.  And using this phone also caused it to warm up...and when I say warm I mean melt!  Not literally but after about a 30 minute conversation, the phone was quite uncomfortable to hold.Battery life was good.  I didn't have it long enough to really test it but moderate usage should yield a day without too much difficulty.  Still a phone that'll need to be charged daily.So to end... for a good, unlocked, middle to low-end phone, this is a very good choice.  It's far from perfect but still better than other "generic" phones I've used in the past.

Reviews.Title: A phone that meets most of your needs
Reviews.Author: Dixon Vivas
Reviews.Content: First thing to do with this device is the amount of benefits it offers in relation to its price making the cost-benefit ratio is one of the biggest.The Android version is one of the most updated, holds dual sim and working frequencies gives the same for most providers.The user experience is exquisite and management software for dual sim works perfectly allowing configure which works by default to send sms, make calls or connect to data.The only disadvantage is that it does not have front camera, everything else around is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Guardedly optimistic
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth "edlp"
Reviews.Content: Touch sensitivity is wonky, sometimes reacts easily and other times not at all-seems worse when trying to dial a number off of contacts as well as in changing ringtones, notifications, things like that.  Downloading apps can be a real chore even with data connectivity and wi-fi on.On the plus side, battery life is great, doesn't come with lots of bloatware, so you can pick and choose what you want.  I have no need of the dual sim, so can't report on that. I'm using AT&T; and phone is always in 3G mode-good and fast.  Ordered from ATC LLC as an expedited shipment but did not come any sooner than it would as a regular delivery and they refunded my monies; ATC is quick to respond and very polite.Phone has a solid feel to it, colors are great. Haven't tried the camera yet. Audio is good, so are phone connections.  No problem getting connected, just slipped in my SIM card, went by AT&T; store for the data plan and the phone was up and running.If anyone can suggest how to handle the download issue I would be much obliged.

Reviews.Title: could b great
Reviews.Author: Wendy B.
Reviews.Content: I loved the phone and the way it felt and ran, but some of the push points did not act right away and it was frustrating. One of the main reasons I sent it back was because the battery was bad - I would be trying to work with it and the battery would go down in 2 hours. The second reason is because every time I made a phone call, it would heat up -  to an extreme. I almost asked them to send me another phone, but they tried to make excuses as to why it was not running properly - and I saw that as a red flag - so I sent it back.If the phone was up and running like it should have been, I would have loved it - nice and sleek.

Reviews.Title: Great affordable dual SIM quad band 3G GSM phone. One star less for missing manual and poor battery time.
Reviews.Author: Vartan Esenyan
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone and a must for frequent travelers who hate to carry 2 phones. I use it with Tmobile and Exactta Global which worked even in the middle of Mediterranean while cruising. Now Battery time is not great. GPS, WIFI, 2 SIM cards, media player and bluetooth being on simultaneously will give you just about 5 hours on a full charge.The phone is sleek looking, WiFi GPS and Radio are all sensitive. Screen is high contrast large enough resolution with gorgeous colors, pretty much a useful size to watch movies and read news, and easy to use.However in full bright sun forget it. Even in high intensity mode you won't see much. I wish it came with a user manual or a link to internet for me to download. I contacted the seller they acknowledged and hopefully I will get the pdf manual information. I haven't seen a paper printed invoice either in the shipping envelop.I like the fact that it came with Android 4, and very stable. 2 Gig internal memory is just about enough to put some extra apps. 512Meg ram is also not much so I stick to basics and will not tinker with this phone to make it look like a tablet. I see ZTE brand becoming more relevant player on US markets soon.So far this phone is a lot better supported in North Korea, Philippines and in Latin America. USA will have to wait.

Reviews.Title: a very good cell phone
Reviews.Author: Ali Acosta
Reviews.Content: This is a real very good cell phone with sistem android, good technical capacities, 4.3" screem, nice 5MP camara. it's an excellent product and not expensive. it was a Prompt and courteous service.

Reviews.Title: Great Team
Reviews.Author: Josue
Reviews.Content: Meets my expectations. He wanted a modern phone, android, dual sim and looking but I found this team. The team structure is solid and safe, conn regarding the operation is very fluid. The battery is still being analyzed. I highly recommend buying this phone

Reviews.Title: ZTE
Reviews.Author: amador molina
Reviews.Content: IF THE PHONE IS EXCELLENT BUT ONLY HAS SOME LANGUAGES (SPANISH LANGUAGE MISSING) BUT ALSO CAME WITHOUT MICRO SD MEMORY EXPANDABLE AND SAYS THERE AS COMES WITH ACCESSORIES. THE PHONE WAS PURCHASED FOR USE HERE DIGITEL VENEZUELA BUT IT WORKS ONLY FOR 2G AND NOT CONNECTED TO INTERNET WI-FI ONLY ..DELIVERING EXCELLENT TIME GREETINGS

Reviews.Title: Just what I want
Reviews.Author: Natanael Gil "Natico"
Reviews.Content: Im in Venezuela, so this one its just the great phone everyone talks about. It works very well on every provider in Venezuela. It can run almost every game out there, and can be rooted. the downs (not a real worry for me) its that it seems to warm up when u play, u cant switch the sims via software (its has a dadicated slot for the 3g sim and the second slot its only 2g) so if u want to do it, u need to fisically switch the sims. And a real down side its that u cant find accesories for it in venezuela, so if u are planning to buy it here, also buy the accesories u want. I will buy a zte phone again, if this one get broken or stolen.

Reviews.Title: lovely phone
Reviews.Author: DAVID N.
Reviews.Content: because i love every thing about the phone. its facilities are wonderful. i can recomend it to any one because it meets my expections

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: mel
Reviews.Content: It has just everything that my Uncle was looking for and he finds it really kool that he can use 2 sim cards at once. It came in  a good condition and everything is working ok.

Reviews.Title: Junk Phone
Reviews.Author: NATON "ndep22"
Reviews.Content: This ZTE phone constantly shuts off on its own. It happens daily. Battery power is not the issue, and Reception is not the issue. This is the fourth phone I have had to return same brand, same model, same discrepancy. My mistake. Save yourself the frustration. Do not buy ZTE products.

Reviews.Title: wilman yance
Reviews.Author: wilman yance
Reviews.Content: excelente muy buen vendedor la entrega si hizo efectiva en el tiempo correspondiente muchas gracias excelente equipo . . .

Reviews.Title: ZTE V970M android phone, excellent value and price.
Reviews.Author: Gaetano Lombardo
Reviews.Content: I met the Chinese brand ZTE several years ago when I bought the ADSL modem for internet. Those were excellent equipment, durable and low prices. Then when I dabbled in the world of Android phone I decided to try the ZTE Racer, a very good, efficient and priced right. Since I have with this phone over a year and have been very satisfied. Now I want a more powerful and I chose the same brand ZTE V970M model, which in my opinion is one of the best android phones price and value of the market, and I'm right under the very good opinions and reviews that you find on the Internet, see YouTube for example. And to top it off starting this year, in the technology fair CES 2013, Las Vegas USA, ZTE stood out among large manufacturers introducing the world's thinnest cell.

ProductInfo.Features:
Dual card W+G with dual standby,Making life and work at your hand:With this, you can insert one SIM for work and the other one for life, dual standby. And moreover, the 1st card slot supports WCDMA, this is 3G network.
5.0 MP Back Camera, Wonderful images when you are in travel: Back camera is 5.O MP which supports auto focus, and moreover, it supports Maximum 2592 X 1944 Resolution.
Android 4.0 Operating System, More apps for you from Playstore: This is the latest android 4.0 system with built-in android play store, you can download more apps there. And, it supports more software than the other android systems.
4.3" HD Capacitive Screen, Mirroring a colorful world: With this 4.3" HD Screen, you can enjoy your life everywhere. More clearer when watch videos, and more easier when touch the screen. With Gravity Sensor built-in, you will get a wide screen when play games.
MTK 6577 1GHz CPU. Powerful Dual-core High performance android handset.
ProductInfo.Name: ZTE V970M GRAND X 4.3" Extra Slim Dual Core Dual SIM Dual Standby Android 4.0 Smartphone 4GB Unlocked/ SIM-free qHD 16M color Large TFT Capacitive Screen High performance android 2G/3G handset
